description: This file defines a health check route using Flask and Flask-Smorest. It creates a Blueprint named 'Healt Check' (note the typo) with a route at the root URL '/' that responds with a health status message.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask MethodView that provides a GET endpoint for health checking

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the health check route, returning a JSON message indicating the service is healthy

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
